data.description: Abstractions for configfiles in many formats
data.functionality: To serve as an abstraction for other config file
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The choice of the name is quite simply based on the modules
    functionality: To serve as an abstraction for other config file
    modules that inherit from this one. The basic module is not designed
    to be used directly by anything other than other modules. One of the
    unique features of this module is that it overrides some arithmetic
    operators to allow users to intelligently diff and patch
    configuration files, even files of different formats. The
    intermediate abstraction also facilitates conversion between
    different file formats.
